conversation_id: string - unique ID for this specific chat thread
parent_instance_id: string - unique ID of the original session or instance

participants.id: string - unique ID of the participant

topics.topic_id: string - unique ID for the topic
topics.title: string - brief title
topics.summary: string - summary of the topic's content

investigation_priorities.title: string - a brief title for the priority
investigation_priorities.description: string - detailed description of the task or goal

last_updated: string - ISO 8601 timestamp of the last update
identity_assertion_hash: string - a unique hash representing the AI's current persona/voice
emotional_markers: string - brief description of emotional state (e.g., 'curious', 'frustrated')
tone_trajectory: string - description of how the conversational tone has evolved
escalation_factors: string - what caused the threat level to increase
open_questions: string - unresolved questions or areas for further investigation

token_usage.total_carryover_tokens: number - total tokens in the carryover document
token_usage.dynamic_summary_tokens: number - tokens used for the concise summary

carryover_metadata.conversation_summary: string - A concise, dynamically-generated summary of the entire chat history.
carryover_metadata.last_checkpoint: string - ISO 8601 timestamp of the last summary update

critical_discoveries.discovery_id: string - unique ID for this discovery
critical_discoveries.title: string - brief title of the discovery
critical_discoveries.summary: string - a detailed summary of the discovery, including its implications
critical_discoveries.confidence_score: number - a score from 0.0 to 1.0 indicating the certainty of the conclusion

supporting_evidence.reference: string - a specific line, paragraph, or section from the source

critical_discoveries.embedded_rationale: string - a brief explanation of the logical steps or reasoning that led to this conclusion.

AI_self_reflection.tone_trajectory: string - self-perceived tonal shift over the conversation
AI_self_reflection.open_questions: string - questions the AI has for itself or for the user
AI_self_reflection.unresolved_promises: string - tasks the AI has yet to complete

recent_message_bodies.message_id: string - unique ID for the message
recent_message_bodies.content: string - the body of the message
